text: Aladdin al-Ayyubi (Arabic:علاء الدين الأيوبي)(Born 1958) is a Syrian TV presenter. He died of a heart attack while he was working at his office in Damascus at the age of 57. == Background == He held a diploma in commerce and economics and a diploma in media. He presented several television and radio programs, most recently he was the manager director of the Noor al-Sham satellite channel. == References == Category:1958 births
title: Aladdin al-Ayyubi
